column3: Liberalism is trust of the people tempered by prudence. Conservatism is distrust of the people tempered by fear.
Do the thing you fear most and the death of fear is certain.
Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
I fear my enthusiasm flags when real work is demanded of me.
A propensity to hope and joy is real riches; one to fear and sorrow real poverty.
We should face reality and our past mistakes in an honest, adult way. Boasting of glory does not make glory, and singing in the dark does not dispel fear.
Americans are in a cycle of fear which leads to people not wanting to spend and not wanting to make investments, and that leads to more fear. We'll break out of it. It takes time.
I don't fear anybody... at all.
But I love being scared. I think you're brave only when you do things that scare you. I've always used fear as a motivator. I'm not sure why.
Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
Fear and greed are potent motivators. When both of these forces push in the same direction, virtually no human being can resist.
Just as courage is the danger of life, so is fear its safeguard.

People are prone to taking mental shortcuts. They may know that they shouldn't give out certain information, but the fear of not being nice, the fear of appearing ignorant, the fear of a perceived authority figure - all these are triggers, which can be used by a social engineer to convince a person to override established security procedures.
Logically, harmony must come from the heart... Harmony very much based on trust. As soon as use force, creates fear. Fear and trust cannot go together.
The way we can allow ourselves to do what we need to, no matter what others may say or do, is to choose love and defy fear.
The process of spotting fear and refusing to obey it is the source of all true empowerment.
Shyness is invariably a suppression of something. It's almost a fear of what you're capable of.
Fear not, we are of the nature of the lion, and cannot descend to the destruction of mice and such small beasts.
A higher rate of urgency does not imply ever-present panic, anxiety, or fear. It means a state in which complacency is virtually absent.
Courage is a peculiar kind of fear.
If you let your fear of consequence prevent you from following your deepest instinct, your life will be safe, expedient and thin.
A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand.
True nobility is exempt from fear.
Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
Having a child, that's always been my biggest fear. I want a child and I fear a child.
